work.summary: Gained hands-on exposure to industrial automation workflows, documentation, and software tools.

projects.name: High-Speed Quantum Random Number Generator (QRNG)
projects.summary: Developed a modular QRNG system using delayed self-heterodyne measurement, coupled with GPU-accelerated post-processing for randomness extraction.
highlights: Achieved 19.5 Gbps extraction rate suitable for Quantum Key Distribution
Implemented randomness extraction on HPC with NVIDIA CUDA
Validated with NIST SP 800-22 & Diehard test suites

projects.name: Study on Quantum Computing Operators, Protocols & Applications
projects.summary: Explored core quantum paradigms and built a Python package for rapid simulation and testing.
highlights: Simulated teleportation, superdense coding & Grover's algorithm on IBM Qiskit
Developed 'qulib', a custom Python package for quick quantum simulations

projects.name: NBA Match Analysis
projects.summary: Created a Python-based analytical tool to evaluate player performance using custom metrics.
highlights: Designed Player Contribution Metric inspired by PER and Box +/-
Generated visual snapshots of individual player impact in games

projects.name: WhatsApp Web Automate
projects.summary: Built a Python automation tool to message multiple WhatsApp users without saving contacts.
highlights: Enabled secure, fast event communication without third-party integrations
Saved significant time in outreach for workshops & events

projects.name: Dynamic Fine Calculation
projects.summary: Designed a C++ prototype for traffic fine calculation based on offender's violation history.
highlights: Proposed fair penalty system incorporating past offenses
Developed proof-of-concept prototype demonstrating policy logic
